data.subject: 진작
data.lyric:
낯설다 네가 없는
 내 모습을 보는 게
 두렵다 네가 없는
 하루를 보내는 게
 내 삶을 환하게 비춰주던
 그런 너였는데
 언제나 내 곁에
 머무를 줄 알았는데
 이렇게 아픈 일인

data.subject: Joy Christmas
data.lyric:
모두 모여 함께
 웃고 들떠있는
 그 속에 밝게
 웃는 네 얼굴
 한번씩 스쳐가는 눈빛과
 알 수 없는 이 느낌 설레임도
 자릴 뜨려하는 너를 보면서
 안절부절 다급해진 내 마음

data.subject: Prison Without Walls
data.lyric:
Trapped inside your head
 Insular, living dead
 
 Existing for a purpose you'll never find
 Induceme

data.subject: Next Of Kin To Chaos
data.lyric:
Stuck in the learning hole
 there is no teaching
 that I can subscribe to
 Just the hatred of being

data.subject: Lucid Fairytale
data.lyric:
Delude yourself with the notion
 That life's viewed defiantly through your eye
 Subconsciously follo

data.subject: Lowpoint
data.lyric:
Banish the emotion
 Severing the ties
 Mutual agressions
 Multiply inwind
 
 Reason lost is reason g

data.subject: I Abstain
data.lyric:
I abstain
 
 Summon my pride
 What Pride behind your blinkered eyes
 Your vigilance is shit
 The lad

data.subject: Cursed To Crawl
data.lyric:
A fragile peace that exists inside
 A frame so shallow, so narrow minded
 An open wound we run insid

data.subject: Plague Rages
data.lyric:
Scale the inferno, take it all in
 Am I right or wrong, or just confused
 Glamorized, dare I say it

data.subject: Social Sterility
data.lyric:
Time for my omittance
 From a sterile existance
 Where the weekend pays homage
 To stereotypical per
